archimate:BusinessRole.name: Transaction Endorser
archimate:BusinessRole.documentation: An Organization authorized under Permissioned Write Access to authorize a Transaction by digitally signing it so it will be accepted by a Validator Node. The Transaction Endorser role is only needed for Permissioned Write Access. It is not needed for Public Write Access. See Appendix E.
